post_text: August 25, 2018 at 6:12 AM#1Hi all,I searched the forum and couldn’t find what I’m looking for. I’m trying to make a startup macro that brings up a pop up that asks you to type in a password. If you type in the wrong password I want it to go back to the pop up and not let you into the showfile. What is the easiest way to do this? What would the syntax be?

posts.post_text: August 26, 2018 at 8:08 AM#2The feature you want is called "Force Login" and a feature since grandMA1. No need for a macro.It's in the global settings.To force a login by command/macro use the command "login please" without any user. This will popup the login-screen, too.Gralf
